name: Kubo Fun
description:
3D puzzle

3D game

There are several cubes in the game:

Cyan is a player, Z, blue is X, purple is Z, red is a dangerous cube, white is static, brown is a cube that can be moved by other cubes, pink is a door, yellow is a bot.

Controllers:

W, A, D, S - control, R - reboot, Esc - exit, E - to the next level, Q - to the previous level.

The player must go beyond the boundaries, and the cubes help him. There are only 20 levels here, but several more levels will be added with updates. My second game :)

I hope you like it!
